CustomField.formula:
IF ( RecordType.Name = "Short Summary of Income", ( Gross_Monthly_Income__c + Other_IncomeC__c ),
IF ( RecordType.Name = "Full Details Of Income/Living Expenses", (Salary_and_Allowances_as_per_pay_slips__c + Gratuity_in_lieu_of_Pension__c + Performance_Based_Pay_Includes_Commissi__c + Net_Profit_Sole_TraderC__c + Director_s_Emoluments_Director__c + Share_of_Profit_Partnership__c + Share_of_Profit_Shareholder__c + Pension__c + Existing_Real_Estate_Rental_IC__c + Existing_Real_estate_Rental_II__c + Projected_Real_Estate_RentalC__c + Other_IncomeC__c),0) )
CustomField.label: Gross Monthly IncomeC
